Class DatabaseViewClassList

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.database.DatabaseViewClassList
public class DatabaseViewClassList extends Object
DatabaseViewClassList handles database operations related to fetching class and course information for teachers. It provides methods to retrieve the classes taught by a specific teacher as well as the courses associated with the currently logged-in teacher, including program details.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseViewClassList

      public DatabaseViewClassList()

  • Method Details

    • getClassesByTeacher

      public static List<CourseInfo> getClassesByTeacher(int teacherId)
      Retrieves a list of classes taught by a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher whose classes are to be fetched
      Returns:
      a List of CourseInfo objects containing course name, section, and program

    • getCoursesByTeacherId

      public static List<String[]> getCoursesByTeacherId()
      Retrieves a list of courses taught by the currently logged-in teacher. Each course entry includes course name, section, program, and program abbreviation.
      Returns:
      a List of String arrays where each array contains: [0] - course name, [1] - section, [2] - program, [3] - program abbreviation

    • fetchAvailableCourses

      public static List<String> fetchAvailableCourses()
      Fetches a list of all available courses along with their sections. The format of each entry is "course_name - section".
      Returns:
      A list of strings representing courses and their sections.

    • deleteCourse

      public static void deleteCourse(String courseName, String section)
      Deletes a class/course and all associated attendance and enrollment records for the currently logged-in teacher. Performs deletion in a transaction to ensure data integrity.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The name of the course to delete.
      section - The section of the course to delete.

    • updateCourse

      public static void updateCourse(String oldCourseName, String oldSection, String newCourseName, String newSection)
      Updates the course name and section for a class identified by the old course name and section.
      Parameters:
      oldCourseName - The current course name to find.
      oldSection - The current section to find.
      newCourseName - The new course name to update.
      newSection - The new section to update.

    • getStudentsEnrolledForTeacher

      public static List<Student> getStudentsEnrolledForTeacher(String courseName, String section, String program, int teacherId)
      Retrieves a list of students enrolled in a specific class taught by a given teacher.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The name of the course.
      section - The section of the course.
      program - The program associated with the class.
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects enrolled in the specified class.

    • unenrollStudentsFromClass

      public static void unenrollStudentsFromClass(List<Student> students, String courseName, String section, String program, int teacherId)
      Unenrolls a list of students from a specified class taught by a given teacher. Executes the unenrollment in a single transaction using batch deletion.
      Parameters:
      students - The list of Student objects to be unenrolled from the class.
      courseName - The name of the course.
      section - The section of the course.
      program - The program of the course.
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher who teaches the class.

    • getUnenrolledStudentsWithEnrollmentId

      public static List<Student> getUnenrolledStudentsWithEnrollmentId(int classId)
      Retrieves a list of students who are not enrolled in the class identified by the given classId.
      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the class.
      Returns:
      A List of Student objects representing students who are not currently enrolled in the class.

    • getClassId

      public static int getClassId(String courseName, String section, String program, int teacherId)
      Retrieves the class ID for a given course name, section, program, and teacher ID.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The name of the course.
      section - The section of the course.
      program - The program associated with the class.
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher who teaches the class.
      Returns:
      The class ID if found; otherwise, returns -1.

    • checkUsernameExists

      public static boolean checkUsernameExists(String username)
      Checks if a username already exists in the Users table.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the username exists, false otherwise.

    • getEnrolledStudentIds

      public static Set<Integer> getEnrolledStudentIds(int classId)
      Retrieves the set of student IDs enrolled in a specific class.
      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the class.
      Returns:
      A Set of student IDs enrolled in the class. Returns an empty set if no students are found or on error.

    • enrollStudents

      public static boolean enrollStudents(int classId, List<Student> students)
      Enrolls a list of students into a class.
      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the class.
      students - The list of Student objects to enroll.
      Returns:
      true if all students were enrolled successfully; false otherwise or if the input list is null/empty.
